meanings.definition: To arrange for compensation in the event of damage or loss
meanings.sent1: I will insure my car to protect it from accidents.
meanings.sent2: It is important to insure your belongings in case of theft.
meanings.sent3: I always insure my phone so I don't have to worry about breaking it.
meanings.sent4: She decided to insure her trip with travel insurance for peace of mind.
meanings.sent5: Insuring your house can save you from financial troubles in case of a disaster.

meanings.definition: To provide or obtain insurance for
meanings.sent1: The company will insure their employees against workplace injuries.
meanings.sent2: It is wise to insure your health to cover medical expenses.
meanings.sent3: He likes to insure his gadgets to avoid costly repairs.
meanings.sent4: Insuring your pet can help with unexpected veterinary bills.
meanings.sent5: She decided to insure her jewelry to protect it from loss or damage.

meanings.sent1: I will insure that the package arrives on time.
meanings.sent2: To ensure success, it is important to plan ahead.
meanings.sent3: He wanted to insure a good grade on the test, so he studied hard.
meanings.sent4: She tried to insure her spot in line by arriving early.
meanings.sent5: Insuring a peaceful night's sleep involves turning off all electronic devices.
